product_name: PATC Hiking Guide to the Pedlar District - George Washington National Forest - 3rd Edition
long_description: Hiking Guide to the Pedlar District - George Washington National Forest covers 50 trails in the area and offers trail length, conditions, landmarks and the history and geology of the region.
short_description: Hiking Guide to the Pedlar District - George Washington National Forest covers 50 trails in the area and offers trail length, conditions, landmarks and the history and geology of the region.
